resources.string: Brazil is the smallest country in South America.
The Pacific Ocean is larger than the Atlantic Ocean.
Canada has more than half of all the natural lakes in the world.
Over 80 percent of the Nile runs through Egypt.
The Amazon River is the longest river in the Americas.
The capitol of Arizona is Phoenix.
The largest continent on Earth is Africa.
The United States is composed of 50 states.
Are you sure you want to do this?
